info.title: Nutrition Tracker API
info.description:
The Tracker API allows users to manage their products, consumption logs, nutritional statistics, shopping lists, and personal settings. 
This API provides various endpoints for retrieving product details, adding or removing items from shopping lists, consuming products and tracking daily nutrition, 
updating personal settings, and more.

Key functionalities include:
- Managing products: Get, create, and search products by ID or name.
- Consuming products: Record product consumption and update nutrition statistics.
- Managing shopping lists: Create, retrieve, and delete shopping lists, as well as add or remove items from them.
- Tracking daily nutrition: Retrieve detailed nutrition statistics based on consumed products.
- Personal settings: View and update user-specific nutritional goals and preferences.
- Calendar integration: View, create, and update calendar events related to food consumption.

servers.description: url when fetching data from this api inside a docker network

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available products.

500.description: Internal Server Error

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific product using its ID.

500.description: Internal Server Error

get.description: Retrieves a list of products matching a given name.

404.description: No products found with the given name

500.description: Internal Server Error

post.summary: Consume a product and update nutrition statistics.
post.description: This endpoint allows a user to consume a product and update the nutrition statistics for that product.

201.description: Product consumed and nutrition statistics updated successfully.

500.description: Internal server error. Something went wrong while processing the request.

get.summary: Retrieve the diary of consumed products for a specific date.
get.description: Fetches the list of consumed products for a given date.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which to retrieve the diary of consumed products (format YYYY-MM-DD).

200.description: Successfully retrieved the diary for the specified date.

404.description: No records found for the given date.

error.example: No records found for this date.

500.description: Internal server error when fetching diary data.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific consumed product by its ID.
get.description: Fetches details of a consumed product based on its ID for a given date.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which to retrieve the product (format YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the consumed product.

400.description: Invalid ID format (must be an integer).

error.example: Invalid ID format. Must be an integer.

404.description: Product not found for the given ID.

500.description: Internal server error while fetching the consumed product.

delete.description: Deletes a consumed product by its ID and updates nutrition statistics.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which the product is being deleted (format YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the consumed product to delete.

200.description: Successfully deleted the product and updated nutrition statistics.

400.description: Invalid ID format (must be an integer).

error.example: Invalid ID format. Must be an integer.

404.description: Product not found for the given ID.

500.description: Internal server error when deleting the product or updating nutrition statistics.

get.description: Fetches the current user settings for nutritional goals and preferences.

500.description: Internal server error while fetching the settings.

patch.description: Updates the user's nutritional goals and preferences based on the provided data.

400.description: Invalid request body (e.g., missing required fields or incorrect data format).

500.description: Internal server error while updating the settings.

get.summary: Retrieve the nutrition statistics for a specific date.
get.description: Fetches the total nutrition statistics for a given date based on consumed products.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which to retrieve nutrition statistics (format YYYY-MM-DD).

200.description: Successfully retrieved the nutrition statistics for the specified date.

400.description: Invalid date format. Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format.

500.description: Internal server error while fetching nutrition statistics.

get.summary: Retrieve calendar entries for a specific date.
get.description: Fetches calendar entries for a given date.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which to retrieve calendar entries (format YYYY-MM-DD).

500.description: Internal server error while fetching calendar entries.

post.description: Creates a new calendar entry with date and time details.

500.description: Internal server error while adding calendar entry.

patch.description: Modifies details of a calendar entry by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the calendar entry to update.

500.description: Internal server error while updating calendar entry.

delete.description: Removes a calendar entry by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the calendar entry to delete.

500.description: Internal server error while deleting calendar entry.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all shopping lists.

500.description: Internal server error while fetching shopping lists

400.description: Bad request due to invalid data

500.description: Internal server error while creating shopping list

get.summary: Get a shopping list by ID
get.description: Retrieve a specific shopping list by its ID.

500.description: Internal server error while fetching shopping list

post.summary: Add an entry to a shopping list
post.description: Add a new item to an existing shopping list.

requestBody.description: Shopping list entry to be added

400.description: Bad request due to invalid data

500.description: Internal server error while creating shopping list entry

example.error: Failed to create shopping list entry

delete.description: Delete a shopping list by its ID.

500.description: Internal server error while deleting a shopping list

delete.description: Remove an entry from a shopping list by its entry ID.

500.description: Internal server error while deleting a shopping list entry

example.error: Failed to delete shopping list entry
